title: Step Twelve
subtitle: Having had a spiritual awakening as the result of these steps, we tried to carry this message to addicts, and to practice these principles in all our affairs.

questions.prompt: Have I had a spiritual awakening?
What does a spiritual awakening mean to me?
How has my spiritual awakening affected my life?
In what ways have I been changed by working the steps?
How has my thinking changed?
How have my attitudes changed?
How has my behavior changed?

questions.section: As the result of these steps
questions.prompt: What specific changes in my life can I trace directly to working the steps?

questions.section: As the result of these steps
questions.prompt: How has each step contributed to my spiritual awakening?

questions.section: As the result of these steps
questions.prompt: What promises of the program am I experiencing?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: What is the message I'm supposed to carry?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: How do I carry the message of recovery?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: Do I have a sponsor?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: Am I a sponsor? If so, to how many people?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: What am I doing to help newcomers?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: What service commitments do I have?

questions.section: We tried to carry this message
questions.prompt: How has being of service benefited me?
Do I carry the message to all addicts, or just those I like?
Do I practice the principle of attraction rather than promotion?
Am I willing to go to any lengths to help another addict?
What are the spiritual principles I've learned from the Twelve Steps?
Which principles am I practicing in my life today?
Which principles do I have the most trouble practicing?
Am I practicing spiritual principles in all areas of my life?
How am I practicing spiritual principles at work?
How am I practicing spiritual principles at home?
How am I practicing spiritual principles in my relationships?
Are there areas of my life where I'm not practicing these principles? Which ones?
What do I need to do to practice spiritual principles in all areas of my life?
What am I doing to maintain my spiritual condition?
Am I attending meetings regularly?
Am I working with my sponsor?
Am I staying in touch with other recovering addicts?
Am I continuing to work the steps?
How am I practicing the principle of service in my life today?
How am I practicing gratitude in my life today?
How am I growing spiritually?
How has my life changed as a result of working all Twelve Steps?
What does recovery mean to me today?
What are my goals for my continued recovery?
